results.title: [Compilation of excerpts from Buster Keaton's short films]
results.creator_credit: Buster Keaton and Buster Keaton Films
results.brief_description:
A compilation of excerpts from some of Buster Keaton’s silent slapstick comedy films.
1. Buster Keaton gets a job in an ice cream parlour.
2. Keaton plays baseball.
3. Keaton plays a ‘colored’ waiter.
4. ‘College’ (part 4) - Keaton tries out in track and field.
5. Keaton joins a rowing club.
6. Keaton shows his guests around his ‘modern’ mansion.
NB: No opening title sequences and shorts are spliced together.
